response.overview: The horseman Ali (Allam Al-Khail) dies, and his son Hammadi suffers a psychological shock, as a result of which he loses his speech and finds himself alone with a necklace symbolizing horsemanship that his father left him. Hammadi’s condition worsens, especially when his mother marries another man according to the customs and customs followed in the tribe.
response.title: علام الخيل
